goal.en: "The error correcting code plays an important role in the design of digital communication systems. The objective of this class is to let students learn the fundamental theory of the error correcting codes, including linear algebra and linear block codes. The widely used error correcting codes are introduced, including DCH code, Reed-Solomon codes and convolutional codes."
goal.ch: 除了使學生能夠意識到其實錯誤訂正碼是很常被應用於日常生活中，並了解其中的理論及原因。另外建立研究生基本通訊系統的知識，以奠定未來於學術研究的基礎。
